name: CVE-2010-2558
description: Race condition in Microsoft Internet Explorer 6, 7, and 8 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via vectors related to an object in memory, aka "Race Condition Memory Corruption Vulnerability."
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:internet_explorer:6:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:-:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:-:sp2:*:*:professional:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2003:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:internet_explorer:7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:-:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:-:sp2:*:*:professional:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2003:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:-:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:internet_explorer:8:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:-:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:-:sp2:*:*:professional:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2003:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:-:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
